Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BasicProduction
    BasicProduction Class defines inputs and outputs of a basic production.
    Board
    Board Class contains all parts defining the playing board for each Player.
    CardSlot
    CardSlot Class defines methods of a RedCardSlot object to be used only on the Model.
    DevelopmentCard
    DevelopmentCard Class describes the different methods needed for the creation and usage of a Development Card inside the Model.
    DevelopmentCardDeck
    DevelopmentCardDeck Class defines methods to be used on Development Card Deck objects inside the Model.
    DevelopmentCardSlots
    DevelopmentCardSlots Class defines methods used on the Model to modify the player's Development Card Slots.
    DevelopmentCardTable
    DevelopmentCardTable Class contains all 12 Development Card decks available for the player to buy.
    FaithCell
    FaithCell Class includes new methods for a Faith Cell to be used on the Model
    FaithTrack
    FaithTrack Class includes new methods of the Faith Track to be used on the game's Faith Track.
    Game
    Game Class contains all attributes and methods needed when creating an instance of a new Game.
    LeaderCard
    There are 4 types of Leader Card, depending on the type of special effect they apply on the Game.
    LeaderCardShuffle
    Invoked at the start of the game this class shuffles the Leader Cards for the players to chose
    LeaderRequirements
    Defines a Card with the characteristics required from Leader Card; a Level and a Colour.
    Market
    Market Class defines the contents and behaviour of the game's market.
    Player
    Player Class defines attributes and methods of a player.
    PopeTileClass
    PopeTileClass Class adds methods to Pope Tiles to be used on the Model.
    ResourceManager
    ResourceManager Class contains both a Warehouse and a Strongbox type objects (as final attributes).
    ResourceStack
    ResourceStack Class contains four integer private attributes indicating the amount of each different type of resource: shields, servants, coins, stones.
    Strongbox
    Strongbox Class defines the contents and the behaviour of the strongbox inside the player's board.
    VaticanReportSection
    VaticanReportSection Class adds methods to be used on Vatican Report Sections on the Model.
    Warehouse
    Warehouse Class defines the contents and the behaviour of the warehouse inside the player's board.
    WarehouseDepot
    WarehouseDepot Class defines the single warehouse's depot.
